name: You're Being Followed (Game Jam)
description:
You're Being Followed was made around 7 days for the Gamedev.js game jam.

Due to some minor problems I couldn't get the game to the point I wanted to, so it's pretty much a basic magnet AI in a maze with no Win/Lose conditions and lack of audio.

Will make some minor adjustments and updates in the upcoming days.

The Idea:
You're being followed by an unknown presence as you try to find your way back home. You don't dare to look behind you, so you use your mirror in order to keep track of it.

Controls:
WAD - Move at crossroads
Mouse - Put your mirror up or down to look behind you.
